system.effect: When wielding a weapon for which the character lacks the Ranged Weapon Training, Melee Weapon Training, or Exotic Weapon Training Talent for. The character can make a +0 Tech-use Test as a Half Action. If successful, they can operate the weapon without penalty as if they had the talent for one round, +1 round per Degree of success on test.
